alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 5:29PM EDT until April 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL ISLE OF WIGHT...NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON... SOUTHEASTERN SUSSEX AND SOUTH CENTRAL SURRY COUNTIES... At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Homeville, or 7 miles southwest of Wakefield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Wakefield around 540 PM EDT. Ivor and Dendron around 545 PM EDT. Zuni around 550 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Booth Fork, Berlin, Booker, Yale, Lumberton, Ellis Fork, Manry, Littleton and Dory. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
